data.title: The Magic of Paul Nguyen
data.meta_description: Easily hire The Magic of Paul Nguyen for your special event: I’m Paul Nguyen, and I’m going to take your event to the next level. I’m a professional entertainer, captivating audiences with hard-hitting magic in Bay Area and beyond. If you’re planning a corporate
data.text:
STROLLING MAGIC

Strolling, walk around, tableside — whatever you want to call it, Paul’s stylish and hard-hitting walk around act brings magic close enough for your guests to touch. It never distracts from your main event, but elevates your guests’ experience.

Ideal for any place people are mingling.

-Entertain guests in groups of up to 10 at a time

-Direct, engaging and funny (but never irritating — I’m not that guy)

-Each group or table gets a powerful and unique experience

-Packs small, delivers big — no table or bulky equipment required

STAND UP SHOW

Paul’s stand up show will captivate in just about any setting you can imagine. Each show is custom-made to fit your event, connect with your guests and get the crowd singing your praises.

-Highly interactive show for 4-40 people

-Contemporary and impactual close up magic

-Tasteful humor

-Incorporate motivational or brand messages

-High-end sound system included, so you don’t need to worry about a thing

TRADE SHOWS

Trade shows don’t need to be boring. Are you ready for your business to start rocking the trade show scene?

Paul’s dynamic and contemporary strolling magic has the power to halt potential clients and draw them into your trade show booth. Whatever your business or sector, his personal and engaging communication style creates an emotional connection with guests from the word go.

-Intercept and entertain groups of up to 10-15 at a time

-Safe hands to represent your business — engaging, high-quality and fun

-Impress potential customers with a unique experience each time

-Packs small, delivers big — Paul can go all day with only the contents of his pockets

Hi, I’m Paul Nguyen. (It’s pronounced Nuh-wynn.)

That’s me in the picture.

I started booking shows at 15. I would hop on the bus straight from class and head all over the Bay Area, performing at parties, restaurants and events. All the while I was honing my craft, creating an impactful and personal style of magic.

I enlisted at 18 and trained as a communications specialist. I traveled all over the world, connecting with people from diverse cultures. I learned the psychology behind human interactions, behind building rapport and creating emotional connections.

I was able to perform magic in some unbelievable locations, from the harsh 105° heat of Death Valley to the Philippine mountains of Fort Magsaysay (and I still blew their minds).

But enough about me...

You want your event to be a triumph. You want the entertainment to go without a hitch. You want to hire somebody who understands your vision, and can help you achieve it. You want a consummate professional, who’ll take away all the stress.

You want your guests to go away perplexed, delighted and itching to come back.

And you want to be the hero that pulled it all together, to have adoring crowds falling over themselves to congratulate you on your event-planning superpowers (OK, I’ll stop…).

Give me a call and let's make that next event the most memorable one yet!
